title: Is the NIOS on-demand exam tougher than the normal exams of NIOS? - Quora

response.answer_text: The truth is that it's tougher than public examinations, People say it's easy but the answer is NO.Marking and Question patterns are pathetic. Sometimes you may think that you may get above 80marks but end up getting just above pass marks.Since there is no TMA you have to pass with THEORY AND PRACTICALS alone which makes it tougher to pass the exam.After every on demand examinations you have to wait 3–4 months for results if it's failed or low marks then again have to apply for another On demand exam and wait for the results in next 3–4 months. So in short it's a cycle. After the results been declared again wait for 2 months for certificates.

All the Exams of NIOS are tougher, but, students usually take NIOS exams quite litely, and ultimately they regret for it. Just do proper preparation for the Exams. If you did your preparation very well then you’ll definitely Pass in it.  Hope this helps :) Thanks for asking!!
